Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix menu active state for warehouse movements

Changed warehouse menu item from wildcard ''warehouse.*'' pattern to specific routes
(''warehouse.index'', ''warehouse.show'', ''warehouse.create'', ''warehouse.edit'', ''warehouse.show-by-name'')
to prevent both warehouse and warehouse.movements menu items from being highlighted when
viewing the warehouse movements page.

The wildcard pattern was incorrectly matching all warehouse-related routes including
warehouse.movements, causing duplicate active states in the navigation menu.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
